text: Yesli ikh berut v pokroviteli i storonniki tol'ko nepravednyye, ty uvidish' (o Mukhammad!), chto serdtsa ikh okhvacheny slabost'yu i litsemeriyem, i oni govoryat: "My boimsya, kak by nas ne postigla beda, i togda eti pokroviteli ne stanut nam pomogat'!" Mozhet byt', Allakh pomozhet Svoyemu poslanniku i musul'manam oderzhat' pobedu nad vragami i pokazhet litsemeriye etikh lyudey, i togda oni raskayutsya v tom, chto oni skryvali v svoikh serdtsakh iz-za neveriya i somneniya
